runs.comm: not the best start, slides it down the leg side as Tharanga tries to flick it away
gets it to swing down the leg side again, boy that would have been a terrific delivery to a right-hander
straighter but close to the pads and he whips it down to fine leg
keeps it straighter and close to that off stump, he defends back to the bowler
this one moves away slightly after pitching and he gets good carry through to Akmal
comes forward this time, shows the full face and defends
the first false shot, can't blame him for having a swish at that because it was a touch wide outside off, lucky not to get an edge
cuts nicely but finds short cover, good start despite tjose two wides
he too starts off with a wide down the leg side and well done Umar for diving and stopping that
action replay, like Gul, Tanvir too starts off with wides down the leg side, Dilshan's wishing he got some bat on that
he does this time! Forget about chasing that, full and wide outside and he bashes that off the front foot past the covers, Tanvir overcompensating here
slower ball but drifting on the pads, didn't flick it hard but timed it well enough to beat square leg, vacant spaces there

clipped away to the deep behind square and he pushes hard for the second, Malik is at the bowler's end to collect the throw but he messes up, well I think he was blinded by the umpire who walked across
opens the face and dabs it wide of third man
on the stumps and defended back to the bowler
Tharanga makes a hint of room to pierce it throughj the offside but he finds the packed infield
he gets more width this time and it's a fuller ball, once again finds the fielder, Tharanga trying to hit himself into some confidence here, he's had a difficult few matches so far
that's much better, he makes room alright but this time adjusts well and targets the square boundary on the off side, used the pace of the ball and placed it very well
Gul tries to hit back with a short one but he exerts himself too much , too high
goes airborne this time, Gul bowls it slower and pitches it up, Tharanga makes room, gets under the bounce and slices it over cover, nice shot
mistimes the pull and the ball drops short of midwicket
pulls again but this time he beats midwicket, two runs to the deep
clips it in front of mid-on and charges off, the throw just beats the stumps at the bowler's end, close call
Didn't take Cheema long to bowl that special delivery! All pace, swinging in and honing in on middle stump, Tharanga barely had time to get his bat down, the middle stump is pegged back
neat diving save at point by Shafiq, he ,mistimed the cut
Cheema tries to repeat the wicket delivery with Dilshan but the batsman is up to the task, lofts through the line over wide mid-on
picks up the slower delivery, adjusted his shot and clipped it in front of mid-on for a quick single
nice way to push on, Cheema drops it short and wide outside off and Chandimal gets on his toes and carves it over point, good start, eventful over
whips across the line over midwicket
that's a terrible ball, slides it really wide down the leg side and too wide for Dilshan to get some bat on it, have to feel sorry for Umar Akmal
and once again wide down the leg side and Umar's kept bus again, Tanvir's struggling with his radar
bowls it much straighter and the batsman chops it hard down to mid-off and sets off
he drops it a bit shorter and hones in on the off stump, Chandimal can't resists a slash, close to the edge
chops it down towards point and Dilshan was off for the run in a flash

another quick single, he squeezes it out towards cover and sets off, the throw is a bit wide and wild towards the bowler's end and the fielder backing up fumbles, Dilshan over-ran the single and hence had to send Chandimal back as they attemped the second run
pitched up outside off and he gets under the bounce and lofts him downtown to long-off
gets on his knee and sweeps over square leg, well fielded in the deep
good shot! He comes from round the wicket and generously tosses it up, he chips down and lofts wide of mid-off
the dreaded top-edge! Dilshan stays at the crease and tries to slog him away, gets a thick top edge that swirls in the air and Misbah takes the sitter at short midwicket

appeal for a stumping! Chandimal fails to pick the doosra, Akmal whips off the bails and he just manages to get his foot back in time, was in the air for a second, third umpire takes a look, he's safe
keeps him quiet, he defends
tossed up on middle and leg and clipped away down to fine leg
yes Afridi, lands it outside off and he cuts it to deep backward point
the offspinner this time, clips it behind square on the on side
stays back and punches him wide of cover
the quicker one on middle and leg and he clips him down to midwicket, they're keeping the singles coming
makes a bit of room and punches it down to sweeper cover
chipped in the air down to midwicket but it was safe because the fielder was pushed back
tosses it very slowly outside off and pushed off the front foot down to cover
defends this to the off side
shows his authority there, makes a bit of room and carves it high over extra cover, one bounce and four
he comes round the wicket this time, steers it wide of point for a single
tossed up on middle and leg and clipped down to mid-on
forces it down to long-on and another single
fires it wide down the leg side
full on the of stump and driven wide of mid-off
stays back and punches it down the ground
full and wide outside off and he drives hard to the sweeper on the off side
stays back and clips him down to deep midwicket
stays back and clips it against the turn down to long-on
uses his feet and clips him down to wide long-on for a couple

that's a very soft dismissal! Sangakkara didn't know how much power to use on the shot and he ended up tamely chipping it back to the bowler, don't know if the ball stopped on him but he was clearly caught in a moment of indecision
eases off the mark with a soft drive down to long-on
tossed up wide outside off from round the stumps, driven down to long-off
gets forward and pushes this one to long-on
stays back and cuts to the sweeper on the off side
pushes it just wide of Afirdi and they take a quick single
gently defends down the pitch
good cricket, dabs it with soft hands to the off side and sets off for a quick single
fires it on middle and leg and he pushes it to long-off
don;t ask me how that missed! Peach of a delivery that turns away slightly and beats Mathews on the forward prod, misses the edge and the off stump
fires it on middle and leg, quick single to the on side
taps it to the on side with soft hands and sets off
paddles a low full toss down the leg side down to fine leg
gets forward and pats it down to the off side
gets forward and pushes it towards cover point
nurdles it to the on side for a quick single
flatter one pushes it back to the bowler
nudges it to the on side and he sets of quickly again
pushes it to the off side for another single, they're keeping the score moving
taps it softly to the off side and sets off again
nudges it to the on side and sets off again for a single
chips down the track to loft and he miscues it, the ball drops short of long-off, Afridi there
slices it to the off side for a single
steps forward early to slog him over the on side but he fails to pick the doosra, the ball hits his body and rolls away
pushes it to the off side
close call! He chips down to smash it to the off side and gets an inside edge onto his boot, could've trickled to the stumps
angles it full and outside off, he flicks across the line to the on side
picks the slower one, he clears the back leg and gets under the bounce of a full delivery, hoicks him over deep midwicket, breaks a boundary drought that lasted 41 balls
that's a let off for the batsman! Miscues a pull towards long-on, Malik isnt quick enough to get forward and take it on the dive, the ball drops short
clears the back leg to slog again but he gets an inside edge that bounces off the pitch and beats Cheema
squared up for pace there as he tries to clip it to the on side, the ball hits the thigh and rolls away

appeal for a run-out! He nudged it to midwicket and set off, he turned back realising there was no single  but he really had to hurry as the fielder, Misbah, gathered and flicked it in one motion on the dive, Mathews' dive wasn't good enough as the direct hit sent him back, third umpire confirms it
works it towards short fine leg
outside edge! He opens the face but the ball takes the edge and goes to third man, Tanvir doesn't really bother chasing it, you should have seen the expression on Ajmal's face!
full and swinging in, he gets an inside edge to the on side
fails to put away a full toss, he mistimes it to long-on
chops it wide of point and he sets off for a quick single
clears the back leg and scoops it over mid-off, Gul fields in the deep
slower delivery, he fails to pick it as he goes across the stumps to paddle it away, Cheema appeals thinking it hit the pad
tossed up on middle and leg and he swivels and pulls down to deep square leg to bring up his fifty
sweeps him down to backward square leg for a single
tries to sweep, misses it, it rebounds off Umar Akmal's glove, the running was circumspect, Umar threw it to the bowler's end and the batsman was quite a few feet short
opens the face and steers it to the off side
fires it full and wide outside off, he squeezes it out to point
attempted yorker by Cheema, turns into a low full toss outside off, Chandimal makes room and slices it past backward point for a four

was a bit of a surprise at first when he gave him out, Cheema slid the ball in to the right-hander, on a yorker length almost, he swished at it, failed to make contact, the bat seemed to hit the ground and the ball clipped th edge of his pad in front of the stumps
clubs a low full toss down to long-off
that's a good catch! Umar Akmal's thrilled with that effort, Perera made room to squirt out a yorker, got a thick outside edge and Akmal swooped to his left and pulled off a good diving catch
forces it to the on side but mistimes the shot
Timber! That inswinging yorker was a bit too much for Malinga, he made room, exposed the woodwork and Cheema was on target,  middle stump is flattened
slides it wide down the leg side, too wide for him to chase it
close to another wide down the leg side, that clipped the pad on the way to the keeper
another soft dismissal, it's a low full toss on middle and leg, he makes room and clips him down to midwicket, straight to the fielder
they've cleaned them all up! Another yorker and it's too much for Fernando, he tries to flick it to the on side and the ball clips his pad and rolls to the stumps
